column1: Thanks to everyone who braved the cold & rain to come out to Pittsburgh's #WomensMarch today. Got to meet a future president https://t.co/51PJG6t59u
Congratulations to #PA17 native Coach @CowherCBS! https://t.co/36lJmg1RYM

3. The Pentagon has reportedly conducted 17 war games that China won and the US lost. We cannot accept that.   We have no illusions about who our enemies are. We're asking whether the administration is focused on the right threat at the right time.

2. This is about the best use of American power. The admin seems to think risking a third long war in the Middle East is in our interest.   I'd recommend they read @eosnos' reporting on how China takes advantage of us when we make decisions like this: https://t.co/ByHr9qnjpm

1. Our debate this week wasn't about which party supports the military more strongly or whether Soleimani deserved to die.   He did. He was a ruthless enemy of the US & our military proved yet again that our enemies should fear a similar fate at any time.
It's almost time for petitions in PA!   Sign up today to help sign & circulate petitions & make sure we get Conor on the ballot in #PA17: https://t.co/wOc68sB8Ax
Congratulations to the new Mayor of Penn Hills Pauline Calabrese. Excited to work together & get things done for our constituents. #PA17 https://t.co/JyACqWqOfg

.@USChamber is running ads against me because I voted to cut r/x drug prices & expand Medicare to include dental hearing & vision.  I was at Penn Hills Senior Center today. At every table people told me how much they support HR3.  And asked me why the Senate won't vote on it. https://t.co/OJPqCfYL0S

The @USChamber is mad that I voted to make medicine cheaper. Medicine that keeps a lot of my constituents alive.   We literally wrote the bill to match what the President said he would support.  Hope he keeps his word & ignores these pathetic scare tactics from big Pharma. https://t.co/TGU2aOApbR

This was one of the first bills I cosponsored when I got to Congress and it was introduced long before I got there.   Today it is officially signed into law.  Thank you @MineWorkers for your relentless efforts to make our government do the right thing. https://t.co/OETm8ZEd9f

What President Trump did was wrong. I hoped he would take responsibility & put this incident behind us. But he hasn’t. Instead he insists the call was “perfect” which means he would do it again.  The evidence is clear. The standard is the standard.  I will vote to impeach.

President Trump’s job on July 25 — & all other days — was to use the power of his office to oppose the adversaries of the United States. Putin is one of those; Vice President Biden is not. We cannot ever allow an American President to play politics in a theater of war.

Our national security requires us to resist Russian aggression in all forms. This isn’t controversial & both parties agree.  What happens in Ukraine will determine how this ends. Every inch of ground Putin gains there makes him more likely to attack a NATO ally putting us at war

Congratulations to #PA17’s WPIAL 2A & 3A champs Avonworth & Central Valley on fantastic seasons. Tough losses this week in the state championships but you guys & your coaches families & communities have a lot to be proud of.

Good luck to #PA17's undefeated Avonworth HS tomorrow in the state AA championship. I've had the chance to see the Antelopes play the past two years in the annual Gold Star Family game in honor of fallen servicemembers. Great team & program. Will be rooting for you guys tomorrow.
Always stand with @AlleghenyLabor & all Pennsylvania workers.  This is ridiculous. https://t.co/yEj5M19AIw

Here we go again. A dark money PAC just dropped $200K on attack ads against us one year ahead of the 2020 election.   We've been here before. Together we took on big money twice last year. And we won.  Chip in to help us do it again: https://t.co/t4TV1KP9h8 https://t.co/ORnwFTddkq

Another big year for high school football in #PA17. Good luck today to Sto-Rox in the #WPIAL 1A Championship Aliquippa & Central Valley in 3A & Pine Richland in 6A (though I can never root against my alma mater Central Catholic).
Good read from @brotheroneill yesterday about Sam Hazo's poem honoring Pennsylvanians who received the Medal of Honor: https://t.co/vdRyOkrpTE

Great to see so many people come out to honor our veterans today at the Beaver County #VeteransDay Parade.   Thinking of all my fellow veterans today those who are with us & those we've lost. Let's all keep striving every day to serve veterans as well as they've served us. https://t.co/pkgGVZxtOA

As we look back on 30 years since the fall of the Berlin Wall and the triumph of America’s bipartisan policy of opposing Russian aggression it is extra special to wish Happy Birthday to the “first to fight for right and freedom” the United States Marines. #MarineCorpsBirthday
Joined @steelworkers in Washington today to rally for secure pensions & #SafeJobsNow. #USWRR19 https://t.co/acPB2veOoX

Please keep Pittsburgh in your prayers today 1 year after the #TreeofLife shooting.  None of us will ever forget the sadness of that day or the 11 lives we lost. Nor will we ever forget that our police risked their own lives to save others.   We will always be #StrongerThanHate.
Thanks for helping to spread the word @MarcellusGas.   Heard you have a special guest at the Shale Insight Conference today. Hope things are going well. https://t.co/dzdmA8VOGW

Gen. Mattis used to say there's "no better friend no worse enemy" than a US Marine.  How can anyone in the world consider us to be "no better friend" if we cut & run?  This is wrong & it's urgent. We have the power to stop this & we need to do it now. https://t.co/ZqozbFxHp2
Great to talk with @MShakeFactory workers last night at the store opening in Cranberry #PA17. Lot of Pens fans came out to meet @jakenbake20 & @Kennedy4848 myself included. https://t.co/7qiTQPYW5K

If this whistleblower was in Russia they'd probably be dead or in prison right now.   In the United States their identity is protected & their evidence has reached a separate branch of government than the one in which they serve.  That's what sets us apart. https://t.co/oaJR4zeTYa

I think we can all take some pride this week in seeing that our system can still work.  A person came forward following the law to report a potential national security threat. They are protected & we got the facts.  That doesn't happen in Russia.   This is what makes us better. https://t.co/oaJR4zeTYa

“After reading the whistleblower complaint against Pres. Trump Rep. Lamb said Thursday he ‘absolutely’ supports House Dems’ investigation of whether Mr. Trump pressured Ukraine to dig up dirt on a political rival ahead of the 2020 presidential elections.” https://t.co/uCM4ObG6E8
I’ll be on CNN with @ChrisCuomo tonight around 915/930 to talk about the whistleblower complaint.

Those of us who supported keeping GM alive a decade ago — and put our wallets where our mouths pens and votes were — didn’t do so to make it easier for management to outsource jobs or hold down pay and benefits forever. #StandWithUS #UAW https://t.co/B5ixjkxFwB
Lawmakers vs. Lobbyists tonight to benefit Hoops for Youth Foundation.   Get me on the court and I'm trouble. https://t.co/Fh0ybTnR3E

Thinking of all of those who lost their loved ones on 9/11 & in the 18 years since — victims of the attacks service members killed in the fight against terrorism first responders who have died as a result of their heroic work at Ground Zero.  We will never forget any of you.

For more than 2 years a lot of people in #NC09 have been working hard to elect @McCreadyForNC.   They faced big odds & big money. They had one election stolen. Today they get a fair chance to make their voices heard & send another Marine to Congress.  Rooting for all of you.

More grateful than ever for all that our firefighters do to protect us and understand better than ever the risks they take to keep us safe.  Thank you @RalphSicuro @Darrinkellypgh & everyone at @PghFireFighters for our #Fireops training. https://t.co/os6GcI3sOX
UNION. https://t.co/nRY4PQA5dn

SCOTUS said that J&L’s union-busting was a “proper subject for condemnation by competent legislative authority.”  When this Congress unequivocally supports union rights & condemns union-busting we’ll be closer to calling ourselves a “competent legislative authority.” #LaborDay

There’s a plaque in Aliquippa #PA17 marking NLRB v J&L Steel when SCOTUS affirmed workers’ rights to organize & bargain collectively.   This story is a good example of what changes when we elect leaders who actually stand on the same side as workers: https://t.co/sJUGPt7Wxi https://t.co/iThFM4Uh5T
Great to meet @SEIU President @MaryKayHenry today. Thank you for coming to celebrate #LaborDay with us in Pittsburgh & for all your hard work & advocacy for our workers. https://t.co/QI49asZUSx
Started the morning with mass at St. Benedict the Moor. Now it’s time to have some fun.  Happy #LaborDay! https://t.co/xB2r5QZkf0
Highlight of the night at the Hookstown Fair was this young farmer introducing me to her pigs Scarlett & THE NOTORIOUS P.I.G. https://t.co/IEuqz3gflG
Great time last night at the Hookstown Fair. #PA17 https://t.co/cS9TI0uK9k

The House passed #HR8 & #HR1112 this year to help prevent these tragedies going forward.   Both bills comply with the Second Amendment & they deserve a vote in the US Senate — regardless of how far the President backtracks on his promise for common-sense reform. #DoSomething

The President is wrong: Our background check system is not good enough.   Dylann Roof was 1 of thousands every year who slip through the cracks & buy guns illegally. If the FBI had more than 3 days to check his background his victims might still be alive. https://t.co/Vgh2vnUf0w
Got to spend some time at camp this week with Coach Mike & the Aliquippa Quips. Excited to watch the champs defend their WPIAL & state titles this year. #Aliquippa #Quips https://t.co/oPiT65IgPq

Great seeing everybody tonight at the St. Teresa of Avila Festival in the North Hills. Thanks to all the people who volunteer their time to make these great community events possible. #PA17 https://t.co/20GvskUXha
Thank you to everyone at the Attawheed Islamic Center in Carnegie for inviting me to join you this morning. #EidMubarak to all who are all celebrating #PA17 https://t.co/6JeRDgYOoP
@Musikfest .@Musikfest https://t.co/PVpcWKuoqs
I was in the Lehigh Valley this week to visit the Allentown VA Clinic & found about @Musikfest in Bethlehem. Had a great time & look forward to coming back. https://t.co/12zGPOEgk8
Let the Senate vote on universal background checks. We passed it in the House & it would pass in the Senate. https://t.co/WjRbuYncYS
The people of Pittsburgh stand with the entire El Paso community. Praying for all of you. We cannot go on like this. #ElPasoStrong

Grateful to Dr. Karen Hacker for her hard work on the heroin epidemic air quality & many other issues. Fortunate to have her joining the federal government as the new Director of @CDCgov's National Center for Chronic Disease Prevention & Health Promotion. https://t.co/Fy4B8Ekaib

Thousands of workers & retirees in western PA just had their pensions cut by 30%. That's not right.  Last night we passed the #ButchLewisAct which will protect the pensions of more than 1 million workers & retirees. Need to get this passed in the Senate & signed into law.
Playing the first pickup game at the new Jessie Bell Walker Park in Aliquippa. Get me on the court and I'm trouble. #PA17 https://t.co/XEzHcPfOgA

Very sad to learn that Officer Calvin Hall died today after suffering three gunshot wounds on Sunday night. Praying for his family & for all his brothers & sisters on the @PghPolice force. Rest in peace sir. https://t.co/iaNu3cjHjP

Making our government work well again has to start at the top. These comments have no place in our national debate over any issue. The President should lead by example and he can start by apologizing. (4/4)
I don’t think he would make the same comment to all of the immigrants and people of color serving in uniform today. (3/4)
What the President said was shameful. He’s supposed to be the leader of all Americans but those comments go directly against our most fundamental ideal — that out of many we can be one. (2/4)
A few people have asked me today what I think about the President's tweets over the weekend. Here's what I think. (1/4) https://t.co/geUHfMUgng
Beautiful weather last night for the Saints Simon & Jude Festival in #PA17. Great to see everybody. https://t.co/wP1Pe1fFbP
Congrats to back-to-back #WorldCup champs THE U.S. National Soccer Team! #USWNT #OneNationOneTeam

Rain mostly held off for us last night at Hopewell Community Day.   Ended up in a watermelon eating contest. I didn't win but the judging & rule enforcement were a little suspect in my opinion.   A lot of fun great to see everybody. #PA17 https://t.co/ZeR5xIBroq
Everything’s bigger at the Big Butler Fair https://t.co/a7tB9XkY8V
Great to see everyone in Leetsdale coming out to celebrate our country today. #PA17 #4thofJuly https://t.co/rQEP024pRA
Great time this morning at the Midland #4thOfJuly parade. #PA17 https://t.co/GMRqNvzbvQ

Happy #4thOfJuly to everyone in #PA17 & across the US & to all Americans abroad. Special thanks to the first responders working today & to the members of our armed forces serving all over the world & sacrificing time with their families to protect us.  Have fun & be safe.

50 years ago brave human beings stood up for their rights at #Stonewall & started a movement that continues today. Thank you to them & to the many members of the LGBTQ community who served in our armed forces before & since. Proud to keep up the fight for full & equal rights.

Took my dad to see @Lin_Manuel's In The Heights today at Lincoln Park High School in #PA17. Great performances & production in a beautiful theater. Happy #FathersDay to all the dads out there. https://t.co/tDW1VM2kjj
Great to see so many people come out today for the biggest #Pride parade in Pittsburgh’s history. #PrideMonth https://t.co/ZYjouA6Duy

The bipartisan support for the American Miners Act of 2019 and similar bills in the past in the often-polarized U.S. Congress is indicative of this recognition. Republican leadership in Congress should end their opposition to a permanent fix. https://t.co/pe3i4hRASD

.@steelworkers President Leo Gerard is a relentless advocate for workers who understood & brought attention to the Chinese threat to American jobs long before many others. Grateful for his leadership & look forward to working with USW's new leadership team. https://t.co/Dp7u9bNJwI

6 months ago USAF Staff Sgt. Dylan Elchin of Hookstown & Army Sgt. Jason Mitchell of Export were killed in Afghanistan. Thinking of them & their loved ones all Gold Star families & all the servicemembers who have made the ultimate sacrifice. #MemorialDay
Happy #ElectionDay in PA. Make sure you get to the polls & vote before 8pm. #PAprimary   You can find your polling place here: https://t.co/vAcxdUKNYU

Excited to read Lambslide. Big fan of Ann Patchett & @ParnassusBooks1 in Nashville. Pretty sure my family members & campaign supporters accounted for +50% of the preorders.   Ann Patchett on Lambslide & our special election last year in PA: https://t.co/KH1f25Fn5H https://t.co/LSAWqKnKOt

During #TeacherAppreciationWeek want to thank to my cousin Cato Gannon: #union member long-time teacher & girls/boys basketball coach at Char Valley HS longer-time Pitt hoops season ticket holder. One of many in #PA17 who dedicate their lives to helping kids including me. https://t.co/lJYpoDYbke

Every day firefighters go to work ready to put their lives on the line for us as soon as a call comes in.   Today we remember those we've lost & show our appreciation for all of our firefighters. Thank you for your service hard work & selflessness. #InternationalFirefightersDay

Yesterday 6 months after the Tree of Life shooting we saw another deadly attack targeting Jewish Americans. Thank you to everyone at Tree of Life & in Pittsburgh for standing with Poway & showing we are all in this together united against anti-Semitism. https://t.co/oSTE1Is9Hl
Happy Easter & Happy Passover to all who are celebrating! Wishing everyone a great holiday weekend.

Beautiful day for a special election. If you're in #SD37 please get out & vote today.   Grateful to organized labor & all the incredible volunteers who have been working hard to win this for @pamforpa. Rooting for all of you today. #PamForPA #UnionStrong #GOTV

Joined @vbcpgh this morning on #VietnamWarVeteransDay. Grateful to the Veterans Breakfast Club for the work they do to care for veterans of all wars. Grateful to Vietnam vets like Dan & Sgt. Jeffcoat for their service & for all they do to support each other & younger veterans. https://t.co/eSQ9H7zmBn

Every time we turn around this admin is trying to take away health care. First preexisting conditions now the entire #ACA. Still no plan to replace it.  We won't lose focus on what you elected us to do: protect your health care & improve the law. https://t.co/zIe7wH2Pgw

Happy 99th Birthday to a true western PA Democrat. Sister of a Marine & Airmen. First vote was for FDR. Deliverer of @_MealsOnWheels to the "old folks" years younger than her. Cleaner of church altars. Beechview's Finest.  They don't make them like you anymore Aunt Patsy. https://t.co/Rz6NQuKeqK

Happy #StPatricksDay to everyone in #PA17 & to all our friends & family back in Ireland.   Special thanks to all the police & public safety officers who made yesterday's parade possible & helped us all celebrate safely.
Great to see Bishop Zubik County Executive Rich Fitzgerald @votefitz @RepAustinDavis & so many other friends today at Pittsburgh's #StPatricksDay Parade https://t.co/vQuIddDivG
Happy Parade Day #HappyStPatricksDay #StPatricksDay https://t.co/OVzf1Rj00q

One year ago today we won the special election by working hard & sticking together.   Thank you for making it possible. Please stay in the fight for our priorities. Please keep pushing me & challenging me to be better.  Let's stick together & keep this grassroots movement going. https://t.co/ku7SF51Xql

As the Administration unveils a budget with deep cuts to Medicare & Medicaid @RepJohnLarson led the first hearing today to protect #SocialSecurity. Proud to cosponsor his #Secure2100 bill to expand benefits & guarantee Social Security through the year 2100.
The name tag says @Darrinkellypgh but the hair gave her away. Great to meet you Olivia. Highlight of my night. https://t.co/Xv1IQzkk2q

This time last year outside groups tried to buy our special election in a gerrymandered district.   Together we beat big money with grassroots energy.   Today we took a big step toward a fairer system that restores the power of working people in our democracy. #HR1 #ForThePeople

Out knocking doors today with @pamforpa. One year ago next week we won a special election here in #PA17. We have a chance for another big win here in #SD37 on April 2nd.   Want to thank all the volunteers working hard to make it happen & elect Pam Iovino to the State Senate. https://t.co/VsT7tdh86r
And to the boys at Mt. Lebanon Moon Quaker Valley Lincoln Park North Catholic OLSH Vincentian & Nazareth Prep. Excited to watch some great games this weekend. #PA17

Too many #PA17 high school basketball teams in the #WPIAL Championships this weekend to fit in one tweet. Congrats & good luck to the girls at North Allegheny Char Valley Central Valley North Catholic Shady Side Academy OLSH & Rochester.

Thinking of my friend @RepDebDingell today as she lays her husband @JohnDingell to rest at Arlington National Cemetery. A WWII veteran a fierce defender of organized labor a legendary public servant who will never be forgotten.

The victims of Parkland & all victims of gun violence deserve action. This Congress has an opportunity to finally take real meaningful action to prevent gun violence — starting with #HR8 a bipartisan bill to require universal background checks. Let’s get it done.

The first time I introduced a motion on the Floor — to protect funding for the VA & its patients & workers — one Republican crossed party lines to vote for it: Rep. Walter Jones. A true gentleman who loved veterans loved the Marine Corps & loved public service. Rest in peace.

Congrats to Aliquippa's @OfficialTyLaw on his selection to the NFL #HOF. Good luck to Penn Hills alum & back-to-back NFL Defensive Player of the Year @AaronDonald97 in the Super Bowl.   From pretty much everyone in #PA17 please beat the Patriots (no offense to Ty Law). https://t.co/2iAaLTfFFz
Because I remember I despair. Because I remember I have the duty to reject despair. — Elie Wiesel  #HolocaustRemembranceDay #NeverForget

Joined @AohAllegheny Division 32 this morning at the National Cemetery of the Alleghenies to pick up wreaths from @WreathsAcross. Thanks to everyone at @VANatCemeteries for the great work you do maintaining this sacred place. https://t.co/1OrBntBJj3

This shutdown was entirely avoidable. This is the same bipartisan solution we reached more than a month ago. 800K+ American workers have been suffering for absolutely no reason.   Thank you to those who were willing to cross party lines. Let's keep that going in the weeks ahead.

6 GOP senators voted w/ Dems to reopen the govt & pay our people. We already have a bipartisan solution to this crisis. Senate ldrsp must join others unafraid to cross party lines for the good of the country.  Sinful that anyone will miss a paycheck tomorrow for work they've done

Senate Republicans will finally vote on whether to reopen the government.  RT to tell them to become part of the bipartisan solution join several House Republicans & all Democrats & end this injustice.  The public servants protecting us must be paid this Friday. #EndTheShutdown

A lot of great local events celebrating Dr. King's legacy including Beaver #MLKDay Banquet MLK Prayer Breakfast at Ebenezer Baptist Church @NorthHillsARC MLK Breakfast & Midland MLK Celebration. Grateful to have so many people in #PA17 committed to making his dream a reality. https://t.co/d7z615Rcf7
Well said. https://t.co/a45hPhektl
